reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Opening and supporting community centers for the provision of psychological, social and vocational rehabilitation services for children, women, adolescents and youth in northern Syria.

description.narrative: - Alleviate the suffering of children living in difficult conditions in Syria Providing prevention services and reducing child protection violations in Syria - To improve the living conditions of adolescents and youth in Syrian society.
Provide safe and equitable access for children, women, and youth to spaces of care and community services that focus on protection issues in the community.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
